title: Didn't receive season 7 border or rewards
body:
As of November 13, 2017, my friends got their season 7 border but I didn't. They said I have to get my rewards to do so but I haven't received a "reward" yet, even though I know I wont get one due to my Misbehavior.

EDIT

Now that I think of it, I don't really mind not having a border, is there anyway I can not receive one?

replies.body: i completed a mission and they give me a chest and a key but i ddint recive the stuff when i cheked my rewards plz help

The rewards simply haven't all been delivered yet. If you still don't see it (and decide you still want it) just reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) after another week or so once all of the rewards have gone out. Once you get it, if you still don't want it write to us and we should be able to get it removed.
